text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days have passed since the<n>tryouts, where Grass
Wonder<n>demonstrated her impressive<n>physical and mental
skills.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ever since then, trainers have been<n>lining up to speak with
her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even today as I walk down the<n>boulevard, I see them
approaching her<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for the sincere remarks,<n>but I must apologize... I
will have to<n>decline your offer.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
B-but why?! If there's a problem with<n>my methods, you can
tell me! I'll do<n>anything to fix it!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I am pleased to hear such generous<n>words. However... my
mind remains<n>unchanged.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I will not be accepting any offers from<n>trainers right now.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I see... That's a real shame, but I hear<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Shoulders slumped in defeat, the<n>veteran trainer retreats
from view.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hm? Ah, it's you...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Might you have come to scout me as<n>well?
choice_data_list: No, I know you wouldn't accept.
No, I know you wouldn't accept.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Yes... I'm sorry about that.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But please, don't misunderstand. It's<n>not that I see some
fault within you.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The problem lies solely within me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That's right. Now... if you'll excuse<n>me, I'll be on my way.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder... What a pity. That<n>problem she
mentioned—I'm sure it's<n>because she isn't cut out for<n>
competition.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, because she's so calm and<n>laid-back that she lacks the
drive to<n>debut and compete with others?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Geez, I guess if she herself doesn't<n>care about winning,
there's not much<n>we can do...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't long until other trainers<n>began whispering the
same thing<n>around school...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Some days later, I see Grass Wonder<n>and El Condor Pasa
running together.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Pheeew... It was really simpatico of<n>you to run with me,
Grass! I think I've<n>about finished.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I see. It was nice spending time with<n>you. I'll keep running a
bit more.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I wish to improve my stamina with a<n>little more training.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Why stamina? I didn't think<n>you had any big issues in
that area...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, far from it... I still have quite a<n>ways to go.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
One more step... When my stamina is<n>all but gone on the
final stretch, I need<n>to be able to push one more step<n>
forward.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huuuuuh...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What is it, El?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Nothing much... Just, you really don't<n>want to accept any
scouting offers?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that... Haha, oh, El. How many<n>times have you brought
that up?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
As you seem to forget so often, shall<n>I write it on your
forehead? "I decline."

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
H-h-hey, gimme a break, por favor!<n>And would you leave
my forehead<n>outta this?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Very well. But that's the truth of it.<n>This discussion is over.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
...You know what's funny though?<n>The trainers are saying
that you're<n>not a competitive person.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
They say you don't accept any offers<n>'cause you lack
fighting spirit... That<n>your calm and gentle nature isn't<n>
good for racing!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hilarious! Hahaha! Maaan, it's<n>amazing how much they
don't get<n>you!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Because the Grass I know—

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El? If you've the spirit to speak this<n>much, I think you can
accompany me<n>a while longer, don't you agree?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I know. How about some<n>stretching? Here, let me help.
Ready<n>and streeeeetch...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Eep?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm really leaving this time! If I stay<n>any longer, I feel like I
might get my<n>joints twisted in ways that'll make a<n>
Romero Special look tame!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Adiooos!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That El sure is something.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ...Now, back to stamina training.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I will not...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I will not relent a second time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Grass Wonder's expression was<n>calm as ever as she
spoke to herself,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The light in her eyes seemed to burst<n>with a fiery blue glow.
